title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\JobTrigger\Trigger
name: Trigger
description:
What event needs to occur for a new job to be started.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.JobTrigger.Trigger

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.schedule
params.description: Create a job on a repeating basis based on the elapse of time.

params.name: data.manual
params.description: For use with hybrid jobs. Jobs must be manually created and finished. Early access feature is in a pre-release state and might change or have limited support. For more information, see https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages.
